text: Longest Common Subsequence Given two sequences, find the length of longest subsequence present in both of them. A subsequence is a sequence that appears in the same relative order, but not necessarily contiguous. * Recurrence Relation: 0; ifi=0(or)j=0 LCS (i, j) = {1+ LCS (i1, j- ), if x[i = 1= yfj-1) | max [LCS (i1, j), LCS (i, j=];if x[i] # y/] Time complexity: by Brute force = O(2â„¢), by Dynamic programming = O(m xn). Space complexity = O(mn); where m and n are length of two given sequences.
